languages.text: "Гвардейцы зовут тебя капитаном — не знаю кто и по какому праву выдал тебе это звание, но оно для меня ничего не значит. Каждым подразделением живой десятины должен командовать надзирающий сержант — где ваш? Мне нужно, чтобы он проводил нас к Арбитес".

"These Guardsmen refer to you as captain — I do not know by whom or with what right that rank was given to you, but it means nothing to me. Every living tithe unit must be commanded by a sergeant — where is yours? I need them to take us to the Arbites outpost."
languages.original_text: "Гвардейцы зовут тебя капитаном — не знаю кто и по какому праву выдал тебе это звание, но оно для меня ничего не значит. Каждым подразделением живой десятины должен командовать надзирающий сержант — где ваш? Мне нужно, чтобы он проводил нас к Арбитес".

traits.locale_text: "These Guardsmen refer to you as captain — I do not know who and by what right gave you that rank, but it means nothing to me. Every living tithe unit must be commanded by a sergeant — where is yours? I need him to take us to the Arbites outpost."
"Guardsman, take us to the Arbites supervising officer. And where is your sergeant?"

"These Guardsmen refer to you as captain — I do not know by whom or with what right that rank was given to you, but it means nothing to me. Every living tithe unit must be commanded by a sergeant — where is yours? I need them to take us to the Arbites outpost."

"These Guardsmen refer to you as captain — I do not know by whom or with what right that rank was given to you, but it means nothing to me. Every living tithe unit must be commanded by a sergeant — where is yours? I need them to take us to the Arbites outpost."

"These Guardsmen refer to you as captain — I do not know by whom or with what right that rank was given to you, but it means nothing to me. Every living tithe unit must be commanded by a sergeant — where is yours? I need them to take us to the Arbites outpost."

"These Guardsmen refer to you as captain — I do not know by whom or with what right that rank was given to you, but it means nothing to me. Every living tithe unit must be commanded by a sergeant — where is yours? I need them to take us to the Arbites outpost."

"These Guardsmen refer to you as captain — I do not know who and by what right gave you that rank, but it means nothing to me. Every living tithe unit must be commanded by a sergeant — where is yours? I need him to take us to the Arbites outpost."

languages.text: «Estos guardias le llaman capitán. No sé quién le ha otorgado el rango ni por qué, pero me es irrelevante. Toda unidad de diezmo viva debe estar bajo el mando de un sargento. ¿Dónde está el suyo? Necesito que nos lleve al puesto avanzado del Arbites».
languages.original_text: "These Guardsmen refer to you as captain — I do not know by whom or with what right that rank was given to you, but it means nothing to me. Every living tithe unit must be commanded by a sergeant — where is yours? I need them to take us to the Arbites outpost."

traits.locale_text: «Estos guardias le llaman capitán. No sé quién le ha otorgado el rango ni por qué, pero me es irrelevante. Toda unidad de diezmo viva debe estar bajo el mando de un sargento. ¿Dónde está el suyo? Necesito que nos lleve al puesto avanzado del Arbites».

languages.text: “那些帝国卫队士兵说你是这里的队长。我不知道你这个军衔是怎么来的，谁给你的，但它对我来说毫无意义。每支什一税部队都需要服从军士的指挥。你的上级军士在什么地方？我需要这个人带我去法务部的哨站。”
languages.original_text: "These Guardsmen refer to you as captain — I do not know by whom or with what right that rank was given to you, but it means nothing to me. Every living tithe unit must be commanded by a sergeant — where is yours? I need them to take us to the Arbites outpost."

traits.locale_text: “那些帝国卫队士兵说你是这里的队长。我不知道你这个军衔是怎么来的，谁给你的，但它对我来说毫无意义。每支什一税部队都需要服从军士的指挥。你的上级军士在什么地方？我需要这个人带我去法务部的哨站。”

languages.text: 「これらのガーズマンはお前をキャプテンと呼んでいるな—誰が、どんな権限でその階級を与えたのかは知らない。だが、俺には何の意味もないことだ。生きている租税の隊は全て、軍曹が指揮しなければならない。お前の軍曹はどこにいる？我々を高等裁定局の前哨基地まで案内してもらわなければならない」
languages.original_text: "These Guardsmen refer to you as captain — I do not know by whom or with what right that rank was given to you, but it means nothing to me. Every living tithe unit must be commanded by a sergeant — where is yours? I need them to take us to the Arbites outpost."

traits.locale_text: 「これらのガーズマンはお前をキャプテンと呼んでいるな—誰が、どんな権限でその階級を与えたのかは知らない。だが、俺には何の意味もないことだ。生きている租税の隊は全て、軍曹が指揮しなければならない。お前の軍曹はどこにいる？我々を高等裁定局の前哨基地まで案内してもらわなければならない」

languages.text: « Ces gardes semblent vous considérer comme leur capitaine. Je ne sais pas qui vous a décerné ce titre, mais sachez qu'il ne signifie rien à mes yeux. Chaque unité en charge de la dîme est dirigée par un sergent. Où se trouve donc le vôtre ? Je dois le conduire à l'avant-poste de l'Arbites. »
languages.original_text: "These Guardsmen refer to you as captain — I do not know by whom or with what right that rank was given to you, but it means nothing to me. Every living tithe unit must be commanded by a sergeant — where is yours? I need them to take us to the Arbites outpost."

traits.locale_text: « Ces gardes semblent vous considérer comme leur capitaine. Je ne sais pas qui vous a décerné ce titre, mais sachez qu'il ne signifie rien à mes yeux. Chaque unité en charge de la dîme est dirigée par un sergent. Où se trouve donc le vôtre ? Je dois le conduire à l'avant-poste de l'Arbites. »

languages.text: "Muhafızlar sana kaptan diyor. Bu rütbeyi sana kim, hangi hakla verdi bilmiyorum ama benim gözümde hiçbir değeri yok. Her canlı aşar birimi, bir çavuş tarafından komuta edilmelidir. Çavuşun nerede? Bizi Arbites karakoluna götürmesi gerekiyor."
languages.original_text: "These Guardsmen refer to you as captain — I do not know by whom or with what right that rank was given to you, but it means nothing to me. Every living tithe unit must be commanded by a sergeant — where is yours? I need them to take us to the Arbites outpost."

traits.locale_text: "Muhafızlar sana kaptan diyor. Bu rütbeyi sana kim, hangi hakla verdi bilmiyorum ama benim gözümde hiçbir değeri yok. Her canlı aşar birimi, bir çavuş tarafından komuta edilmelidir. Çavuşun nerede? Bizi Arbites karakoluna götürmesi gerekiyor."

languages.text: "Diese Gardisten bezeichnen Euch als Kapitän ... ich weiß nicht wer Euch mit welchem Recht in diesen Rang erhoben hat, aber das spielt auch keine Rolle. Jede Einheit des lebenden Zehnts muss von einem Sergeant befehligt werden ... wo ist der Eure? Er muss uns zum Außenposten der Arbites bringen."
languages.original_text: "These Guardsmen refer to you as captain — I do not know by whom or with what right that rank was given to you, but it means nothing to me. Every living tithe unit must be commanded by a sergeant — where is yours? I need them to take us to the Arbites outpost."

traits.locale_text: "Diese Gardisten bezeichnen Euch als Kapitän ... ich weiß nicht wer Euch mit welchem Recht in diesen Rang erhoben hat, aber das spielt auch keine Rolle. Jede Einheit des lebenden Zehnts muss von einem Sergeant befehligt werden ... wo ist der Eure? Er muss uns zum Außenposten der Arbites bringen."
